resources.string: This is the first of a sequence of four Activities. A button on the fourth will use the Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_REORDER_TO_FRONT flag to bring the second of the activities to the front of the history stack. After that, proceeding back through the history should begin with the newly-frontmost second reorder activity, then the fourth, the third, and finally the first.
This is the second in a sequence of four Activities.
This is the third of a sequence of four Activities.
This is the last in a sequence of four Activities.
